summary: This document is an email chain forwarding Jeffrey Epstein's will and probate petition. The email highlights that Epstein created or amended his will on August 8, 2019, two days before his death, suggesting premeditation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is about his will and probate petition, which was created or amended on August 8, 2019, two days before his death.

events.title: Epstein Creates or Amends Will
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein either created or meaningfully amended his will.

events.title: Epstein's Death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide in his jail cell. The email implies the will's timing is suspicious relative to this event.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's will and probate petition are attached to this email.
Epstein created or meaningfully amended his will on August 8, 2019.
The timing of the will (August 8, 2019) is noted as suspicious, occurring just two days before his death on August 10, 2019.
